attributes.action: create a law, enforcing any British government to have a referendum on any decision to engage in war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A law governing this loop hole in British law will make clear to any government the distinct feeling of the public on any decision to go to war. This will no doubt lead to a more democractic society whereby a government is incapable of leading the public into a war with a discrepancy in the actual degree of public support for such an action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
